author: akarasulu
msg: Builds jar of all test utility classes.

author: akarasulu
msg: Configured junit and junitreport to generate xml output into build/tests
then generate html for xml based tests in the build/tests/html directory.
Checkout ldapd-test into same directory containing this project and do
ant.  The default 'test' task generates test classes, runs junit and
produces the html reports from the results.  It's really cool lookin.

author: akarasulu
msg: Added junitdoclet jar and configuration properties for all of ldapd's test
